text: Arvind Mayaram is an Indian Administrative Service (IAS) officer of 1978 batch belonging to Rajasthan cadre.Complete Biodata He was Finance Secretary, Ministry of Finance of Government of India.Arvind Mayaram moved from tourism to minority affairsArvind Mayaram transferred again; now shifted to Minority Affairs On 21 December 2018 he was appointed as economic advisor to government of Rajasthan. == References == Category:Ministry of Finance (India) Category:Indian government officials Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Arvind Mayaram
